participant_1.background:
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.

participant_2.background:
My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

content.text: Great! I am excited for my first day of college.
What are you going to study?
I am not sure yet, but I am thinking about business or marketing.
I love business. I work as a wedding planner and it's so much fun helping people create their dream weddings.
That sounds like a really cool job!
It is! And I get to take walks in the canyon before I start my work, which is a nice way to start the day.
I love nature! I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
I hear you! I have two cats too, and they are so cuddly.
I think I will watch some highlights of basketball games while I eat breakfast. Do you like sports?
I love basketball! I play a few times a week with some friends.
That sounds fun! I am not very athletic, but I love watching sports.
Well, I am sure you will find something you love to do at college.
Thanks! I am excited to start this new chapter in my life!
